overview: When viewed with special prism glasses (two came with the video), the television screen is transformed into a kaleidoscope....one colorful vision after another! I found that when you tilt your head, the TV image stands out even more and you get 3-D- like image in the background. All this is accompanied by psychedelic-type instrumental music, kind of mellow Jerry Garcia sounds and slower "trance music" of today.
title: Headcandy: Sidney's Psychedelic Adventure
